\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 45079}

\subsection*{Rhymes with Bogus }
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{L-Train}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 & 5 flowers & smoked & Lotus/Lily - Nymphaea nouchali var caerulea & \\
\hline
 T+ 0:00 &   & oral & Lotus/Lily - Nymphaea nouchali var caerulea & liquid\\
\hline
 T+ 0:00 &   & oral & Alcohol - Beer/Wine & liquid\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 145.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
Recently I had a chance to try out some blue lotus.  I rolled a cigarette out of 5 flower tops and then proceeded to smoke it.  I got a very mild, almost unnoticeable buzz from it.  Disappointed from the results of smoking it, the next day I decided to eat 6 whole flower tops, the taste wasn't nasty at all, in fact it seems familiar.  I washed it down with the propel fitness flavored water, waited a while, and nothing.  



I also tried it with wine, it gave me a very mild sedated feel.  I was trying to find a nice legal high, because I hate MJ. I like its scent, but the high is very annoying and uncomfortable for me.

\end{document}
